code:
var _AudioManager;class AudioManager{constructor(){this.audioContext=null;this.backgroundMusic=null;this.soundEffects={};this.isEnabled=true;this.backgroundVolume=0.3;this.effectVolume=0.5;this.initializeAudio();}static getInstance(){if(!AudioManager.instance){AudioManager.instance=new AudioManager();}return AudioManager.instance;}initializeAudio(){// 創建音頻上下文
try{this.audioContext=new(window.AudioContext||window.webkitAudioContext)();}catch(error){console.warn('Web Audio API not supported:',error);}// 初始化背景音樂
this.createBackgroundMusic();// 初始化音效
this.createSoundEffects();}createBackgroundMusic(){// 使用 Web Audio API 創建程序化背景音樂
if(!this.audioContext)return;// 創建一個簡單的奇幻冒險風格背景音樂
this.playFantasyBackgroundMusic();}createSoundEffects(){// 創建各種音效
this.createBeepSound('move',[440,523,659]);// C大調和弦 - 移動音效
this.createBeepSound('success',[523,659,784,1047]);// 成功音效
this.createBeepSound('error',[220,185,165]);// 錯誤音效
this.createBeepSound('click',[800,1000]);// 點擊音效
}createBeepSound(name,frequencies){let duration=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0.2;if(!this.audioContext)return;// 創建音效緩衝區
const sampleRate=this.audioContext.sampleRate;const buffer=this.audioContext.createBuffer(1,sampleRate*duration,sampleRate);const data=buffer.getChannelData(0);// 生成和諧的音效
for(let i=0;i<buffer.length;i++){let sample=0;frequencies.forEach((freq,index)=>{const amplitude=0.3/frequencies.length*Math.pow(0.8,index);sample+=amplitude*Math.sin(2*Math.PI*freq*i/sampleRate);});// 添加淡入淡出效果
const fadeIn=Math.min(i/(sampleRate*0.01),1);const fadeOut=Math.min((buffer.length-i)/(sampleRate*0.05),1);data[i]=sample*fadeIn*fadeOut;}// 創建HTML音頻元素用於播放
const audio=new Audio();audio.volume=this.effectVolume;// 將緩衝區轉換為可播放的格式（簡化處理）
this.soundEffects[name]=audio;}playFantasyBackgroundMusic(){if(!this.audioContext||!this.isEnabled)return;// 創建一個循環的奇幻背景音樂
const playMelody=()=>{if(!this.audioContext||!this.isEnabled)return;// 奇幻冒險風格的音符序列
const melody=[{freq:523,duration:0.5},// C5
{freq:659,duration:0.5},// E5
{freq:784,duration:0.5},// G5
{freq:659,duration:0.5},// E5
{freq:587,duration:0.5},// D5
{freq:523,duration:0.5},// C5
{freq:440,duration:1.0},// A4
{freq:0,duration:0.5}// 休止符
];let currentTime=this.audioContext.currentTime;melody.forEach(note=>{if(note.freq>0){const oscillator=this.audioContext.createOscillator();const gainNode=this.audioContext.createGain();oscillator.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(this.audioContext.destination);oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(note.freq,currentTime);oscillator.type='sine';// 柔和的音量包絡
gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0,currentTime);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(this.backgroundVolume*0.1,currentTime+0.05);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(this.backgroundVolume*0.05,currentTime+note.duration-0.05);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0,currentTime+note.duration);oscillator.start(currentTime);oscillator.stop(currentTime+note.duration);}currentTime+=note.duration;});// 循環播放
if(this.isEnabled){setTimeout(playMelody,currentTime*1000-Date.now()+2000);}};playMelody();}// 公共方法
setEnabled(enabled){this.isEnabled=enabled;if(!enabled&&this.backgroundMusic){this.backgroundMusic.pause();}else if(enabled){this.playBackgroundMusic();}}isAudioEnabled(){return this.isEnabled;}playBackgroundMusic(){if(!this.isEnabled)return;this.playFantasyBackgroundMusic();}stopBackgroundMusic(){if(this.backgroundMusic){this.backgroundMusic.pause();this.backgroundMusic.currentTime=0;}}playSound(soundName){if(!this.isEnabled||!this.soundEffects[soundName])return;// 使用 Web Audio API 播放程序化音效
this.playProgrammaticSound(soundName);}playProgrammaticSound(soundName){if(!this.audioContext)return;const soundMap={'move':{frequencies:[440,523,659],duration:0.15},'success':{frequencies:[523,659,784,1047],duration:0.6},'error':{frequencies:[220,185,165],duration:0.4},'click':{frequencies:[800,1000],duration:0.1},'star1':{frequencies:[523,659,784],duration:0.8},'star2':{frequencies:[523,659,784,988],duration:1.0},'star3':{frequencies:[523,659,784,988,1175],duration:1.2},'allComplete':{frequencies:[523,659,784,988,1175,1397],duration:2.0}};const sound=soundMap[soundName];if(!sound)return;const currentTime=this.audioContext.currentTime;sound.frequencies.forEach((freq,index)=>{const oscillator=this.audioContext.createOscillator();const gainNode=this.audioContext.createGain();oscillator.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(this.audioContext.destination);oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(freq,currentTime);oscillator.type='sine';const delay=index*0.1;const amplitude=this.effectVolume*0.3/sound.frequencies.length;gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0,currentTime+delay);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(amplitude,currentTime+delay+0.05);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(amplitude*0.5,currentTime+delay+sound.duration*0.7);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0,currentTime+delay+sound.duration);oscillator.start(currentTime+delay);oscillator.stop(currentTime+delay+sound.duration);});}setBackgroundVolume(volume){this.backgroundVolume=Math.max(0,Math.min(1,volume));}setEffectVolume(volume){this.effectVolume=Math.max(0,Math.min(1,volume));}}_AudioManager=AudioManager;AudioManager.instance=void 0;export default AudioManager;
